#####################################################################
# single python test file
function(buildtestspythonsimple execname sourcename)
  set(CALCEPHPYSHAREDPATH "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/pythonapi/src")
  add_test(NAME ${execname}_py COMMAND "${Python_EXECUTABLE}" "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/${sourcename}" )
  set_tests_properties(${execname}_py PROPERTIES ENVIRONMENT "PYTHONPATH=${CALCEPHPYSHAREDPATH}:${PYTHONPATH};srcdir=${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}")
  endfunction(buildtestspythonsimple)

set (LIST_TEST_PYTHON_SIMPLE 
     mopen mopenfail mgetconstant mgetconstantindex mcheck 
     mcomputeunitfail mcomputeunit mcomputeunitnaifid morientunitfail 
     getversionstr mcomputeorder01 mcomputeorder23 error 
     rotangmomunit rotangmomorder0 timescale timespan 
     getpositionrecordindex getorientrecordindex mgetconstantvd 
     mgetconstantvs fileversion mcomputearrayfail mcomputearray 
     mcomputeunitarray mcomputeorderarray morientunitarray morientorderarray 
     maxsupportedderivativeorder mgetidbyname mgetnamebyidss
)
                 
foreach (PYTHON_SIMPLE IN LISTS LIST_TEST_PYTHON_SIMPLE)
    buildtestspythonsimple(${PYTHON_SIMPLE} ${PYTHON_SIMPLE}.py)
endforeach()
set_tests_properties(mcomputeorder23_py PROPERTIES DEPENDS cmcomputeorder23)
